description: My place is close to Fonda, Thistle Hill Tavern, and Bagel Factory. You’ll love my place because of the location and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: Sunny, cozy Park Slope apartment with deck
review: Great location if you want to stay in Brooklyn. Close to Barclays and the subway. Good grocery shop nearby. Rooftop is sick!
